description: A hash of keys that should be returned, to paths to the data from each item that should be returned.

additionalProperties.description: A path to the data that should be returned for this key, for each item. Each entry in the array represents a key that should be traversed in the results.

items.description: The next key to traverse (['a', 'b', 'c'] means look up { "a": { "b": { "c": ... } } }) and assign that value to the key.
